EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Ardeche Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Ardeche Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Year 7 Parents,
We've received news from the group, they have arrived safely and all is well.
In terms of communication, Mr. Miotti will write on the website that he has set up (below), so please check there for updates.
http://rossmiotti.wix.com/ism-in-ardeche
Because of all the activities set up, if time is limited to be able to write blurbs on this website, the group will send us the information to go out via email.
Kind regards,
Admissions Department The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
